name: Song of Fungus
description:
Hello everyone!!~

I'm a solo developer from Beijing, China!~ I've followed Ludum Dare for a long time but this year is my first time to actually participate! Basically finished every asset in 72 hours including music, programming and 2D/3D art (The camera filter is a plugin called "Beautify" from asset store though :P).

It's a puzzle game about mushrooms and fungus. The goal of each level is to convert all mushrooms in the scene to your side by using spores.

  • Mouse - Move Camera / Spawn
  • ESC - Quit
  • R - Restart Level

Have fun and hope you enjoy it!
